original_title: Humpty Dumpty and Other Cartoon Classics
overview: Four music and dancing cartoon versions of classic children's stories: HUMPTY DUMPTY falls for Easter Egg, but Bad Egg has his eyes on the girlfriend! PEEPING PENGUINS - Ma's four little penguin chicks are just too curious for words... SCOTTY FINDS A HOME - When he comes to the rescue to Grandma Cat, Scotty Dog at last finds himself wanted. ALL'S FAIR AT THE FAIR - With the World's Fair in town there's just all sorts of weird and wonderful machinery to see and things to look at.
title: Humpty Dumpty and Other Cartoon Classics
